MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH14 postcode area of Balerno. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:15pm due to a faulty link box outside 12 Newmills Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:47pm on Friday, 04 December 2020
